english.segment1: How peaceful it feels against my face. Oh, what a long haul. You brought me here for this. I see nothing but disaster. Now I'm taking you with me
english.segment2: A transparent scenery that comes as fast as it leaves
english.segment3: Now my eyes flash with white. It's settling in with all the flickering
english.segment5: The floor is more fitting for my face
english.segment6: Here again? This is getting old
english.segment7: I am being watched. This is overwhelming. Paranoia
english.segment8: As you dig your feet in I will sink my teeth in the floor, While I lay here alone
english.segment9: As the light begins to breach the border, While I lay here alone
english.segment10: Aware of every step. I'm not aware at all. Black flash white I am awake.
